mapper.select:
SELECT log.id_batch id_batch, log.transname transname, log.status status, log.errors errors, log.startdate startdate, log.enddate enddate, log.logdate logdate, log.log_field log_field FROM kettle_log log where 1=1
AND log.transname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{transName},'%')
ORDER BY log.logdate DESC
